title: Second New Glenn launch set for Nov. 9
summary:
Blue Origin says the second launch of its New Glenn rocket, carrying a pair of NASA Mars spacecraft, is scheduled for Nov. 9.

title: Blue Origin test-fires New Glenn ahead of second launch
summary:
Blue Origin test-fired its second New Glenn rocket Oct. 30, one of the final milestones before a launch expected in November.
The post Blue Origin test-fires New Glenn ahead of second launch appeared first on SpaceNews.

title: Blue Origin completes New Glenn static fire test, preparing for NASA’s EscaPADE mission launch
summary: Blue Origin lit up a pocket of Florida's Space Coast Thursday night when it hot fired its New Glenn rocket for an engine test lasting roughly 40 seconds in duration.

title: Blue Origin transports New Glenn booster to launch site ahead of Mars-bound mission
summary: The booster named ‘Never Tell Me the Odds’ will support the launch of NASA’s EscaPADE mission, sending two washing machine-sized satellites on their way to Mars.

title: The second New Glenn rolls to the launch pad—and they expect to recover this one
summary: To be financially sustainable, New Glenn must be reused often.

title: Preparations on track for second New Glenn launch
summary:
Preparations for the second launch of Blue Origin’s New Glenn rocket, carrying a NASA Mars mission, remain on track for liftoff in the next few weeks.
The post Preparations on track for second New Glenn launch appeared first on SpaceNews.

title: NASA, Blue Origin Invite Media to Attend Mars Mission Launch
summary: NASA and Blue Origin are reopening media accreditation for the launch of the agency’s ESCAPADE (Escape and Plasma Acceleration and Dynamics Explorers) mission. The twin ESCAPADE spacecraft will study the solar wind’s interaction with Mars, providing insight into the planet’s real-time response to space weather and how solar activity drives atmospheric escape. title: ESCAPADE launch on New Glenn planned for late October or early November
summary:
The second launch of Blue Origin’s New Glenn rocket, carrying a NASA smallsat mission to Mars, is now expected in late October or early November.
